title: Process
description: An activity that changes inputs into outputs.  It could transform or transport economic resource(s).

name.description: An informal or formal textual identifier for an object. Does not imply uniqueness.

plannedTime.description: The planned or estimated calendar time the process will take (whether being actually worked or not).

basedOn.description: The recipe definition or specification for a process.

classifiedAs.description: References a concept(s) in a common taxonomy or other classification scheme(s) for purposes of categorization.

items.$comment: If possible, this should be a uri reference to a shared classification on the web.

finished.description: The process is complete or not.

inScopeOf.description: Grouping around something to create a boundary or context, used for documenting, accounting, planning.
inScopeOf.$comment: The scope can be any appropriate type of object.  This is most often an Agent, but could also be a geographic or other accounting scope.
